quote: Never say never. I was 300 pounds five years ago, and now I'm a world champion Iron Man athlete.
why_clipworthy: This story of transformation is highly inspiring and demonstrates the power of personal change.
suggested_hook: From 300 pounds to Iron Man champion: Mary Ann's incredible journey.

quote: If you have a transactional-based business versus a relationship-based business, you are definitely not going to succeed.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional focus on transactions in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why focusing on transactions might be hurting your real estate business.
